title: Acropolis Park
description: Acropolis is a recreational destination located in the heart of Nigeria's capital city, and a re- enactment of the Greek architectural masterpiece.

title: Zuma Rock
description: Zuma Rock is a large natural monolith, or inselberg, an igneous intrusion composed of gabbro and granodiorite, located in Madalla, a town in Niger State, Nigeria

title: National Mosque
description: A stunning architectural landmark and place of worship.

title: Millenium Park
description: The Millennium Park is the largest public park of Abuja, the capital of Nigeria and is located in the Maitama district of the city.
